comments.body: Marking this as a new feature since iOS has never supported deleting row by row proxy. No idea how QE got the idea.

Its working fine on iOS as well as android.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130305190758
Titanium Â Studio:3.0.2.201302141201
Device: iOS simulator 6.0 (and Samsung GALAXY Note Android 2.3.6)
